content: Hi @Hawkbox. I think it's worth discussing that for adds, flyers, etc. For the Online Engagement content, i.e. the memes for Insta, Twitter, etc., in my eyes this is not always necessary. You're usually using your phone to look at them, so you don't need to scan a QR code to go to a website.
But I agree, since the pandemic QR codes had a come back ðŸ™‚
